messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: P-P-Pl-leas-s-se com-m-m-me o t-th-he H-HOP-P l-lin-ne, we ar-re h-h-h-hirin-ng-g a n-new H-HOP as ur-rr-ren-ntl-l-ly-y-y-y w-w-w-we d-do't-t-t h-hav-v-v-ve on-n-n-ne

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: We are currently hiring a new HOS, please come to the HOP line.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Random searches by any sec personal is promitted

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Security Alert

Gr3y.T1d3 virus detected in Knob cheese door subroutines. Severity level of 2. Recommend station AI involvement.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Come to the HOP line to get a promotion to help our crew

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Lifesign Alert

Unknown biological entities have been detected near Knob cheese, please stand-by.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Pyroclastic anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Technical Storage.
